chat.save: Save the current conversation as a checkpoint. Usage: /chat save <tag>
chat.resume: Resume a conversation from a checkpoint. Usage: /chat resume <tag>
chat.delete: Delete a conversation checkpoint. Usage: /chat delete <tag>

directory.add: Add directories to the workspace. Use comma to separate multiple paths
directory.show: Show all directories in the workspace

mcp.list: List configured MCP servers and tools
mcp.auth: Authenticate with an OAuth-enabled MCP server
mcp.refresh: Refresh the list of MCP servers and tools

memory.refresh: Refresh the memory from the source

descriptions.clear: clear the screen and conversation history
descriptions.compress: Compresses the context by replacing it with a summary.
descriptions.copy: Copy the last result or code snippet to clipboard
descriptions.terminal-setup: Configure terminal keybindings for multiline input (VS Code, Cursor, Windsurf)

copy.failed: Failed to copy to the clipboard.

compress.alreadyInProgress: Already compressing, wait for previous request to complete

mcp.description: list configured MCP servers and tools, or authenticate with OAuth-enabled servers
mcp.list: List configured MCP servers and tools
mcp.authFailed: Failed to authenticate with MCP server '{{serverName}}': {{error}}
mcp.noServersConfigured: No MCP servers configured. Please view MCP documentation in your browser: {{docsUrl}} or use the cli /docs command
mcp.serversStartingUp: MCP servers are starting up ({{count}} initializing)...
mcp.firstStartupNote: Note: First startup may take longer. Tool availability will update automatically.
mcp.toolsWillAppear: tools and prompts will appear when ready

tips.toggleDescriptions: Press {{key}} to toggle tool descriptions on/off
